name: Ducks in Space (itch)
description:
The Game

Help Mother Duck find her ducklings on a randomly generated planet, but beware of the herons preying on your little ducklings!

Controls

  • Move Mother Duck using A + D or the left and right arrow key
  • Press M to mute the audio
  • Press P to pause
  • Press space or click the buttons in the menus

Running the game

The game should run fine on any Chromium based browsers. We tested with Google Chrome and Microsoft Edge.
